backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles and goal CRUD operations with access control checks and per-user goal storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup with authentication gating, layout wrapper, and routes for goals, create, detail, stats, and settings pages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppNav.tsx: Authenticated navigation bar listing links to My Goals, New Goal, Stats, and Settings with active-route styling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Page layout component providing header with logo, navigation, auth controls, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Login/logout control component integrating Internet Identity with loading states and profile display.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalCard.t: UI card component rendering a goal’s title, status, description, progress bar, and optional target date with navigation to detail view.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalForm.t: Form component for creating and editing goals with validation, state management, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting users to enter and save their name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/state/EmptyGoals: Empty state view encouraging users to create their first goal with a navigation button.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Skeleton-based loading components for list and detail goal views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for loading, storing, and managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and goals via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark mode color palettes and base styling variables.
frontend/src/lib/goals/types.ts: Helpers for mapping goal status values to labels and UI color variants.
frontend/src/lib/goals/validation.ts: Validation functions for goal titles and progress values.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Utility functions for converting, formatting, and displaying time values from backend timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CreateGoalPage.tsx: Renders a form to create a new goal and submits it through useCreateGoal before navigating home.
frontend/src/pages/GoalDetailPage.tsx: Fetches, updates, and deletes an individual goal, showing loading/error states and a form for editing.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboardPage.ts: Displays all goals with filter controls and handles loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Loads and edits the user profile, validating and saving the display name with visual feedback.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Calculates and displays goal statistics including counts and average progress, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended theme colors, fonts, layouts, and animations using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state including features, new requests, metadata, and configuration for a stats and settings page project.
